Title: Day 5: 7:00 P.M. - 8:00 P.M.
Plot:
Jack and Lynn must take action when they discover that the nerve gas is breaking through the protective seals that are keeping the CTU survivors alive. 

Chloe wrestles with her grief over Edgar's death, while Tony contemplates revenge against Henderson. 

Martha bolster's Logan's spirit as he wavers under more political pressure from Gardner.
GuestStars: Peter Holden,  Martin A. Papazian,  Yorgo Constantine,  Elisha Cuthbert,  Thomas Vincent Kelly,  Stana Katic,  C. Thomas Howell,  Henry Ian Cusick
